type.name: Options
type.prop: Optional data to send to the server with the request.
How to send data: `json` to serialise JSON data and `form` for url-encoded transmission with `json` mode by default.
Headers to use for the request.
Add the `Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate` header to indicate to the server that it can send a compressed response.
What HTTP method to use to send data.
Timeout after which the request should cancel.
